section.title: Overview
section.para: &PRODUCT; has a service to send e-mails that requires to be configured before it can work properly. This service is used to send e-mails to users who forgot their username or password for instance.

section.title: Configuring the database for JCR
section.para: The e-mail service can use any SMTP account that needs to be configured in $JBOSS_HOME/server/default/conf/gatein/configuration.properties (Or $TOMCAT_HOME/gatein/conf/configuration.properties if you are using Tomcat).
section.programlisting: # EMail gatein.email.smtp.username= gatein.email.smtp.password= gatein.email.smtp.host=smtp.gmail.com gatein.email.smtp.port=465 gatein.email.smtp.starttls.enable=true gatein.email.smtp.auth=true gatein.email.smtp.socketFactory.port=465 gatein.email.smtp.socketFactory.class=javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
section.para: It is preconfigured for GMail so that any GMail account can be easily used (Just use a full gmail address as username and fill-in the password.
